{{Description|Use the power of Sublime Anemograna to challenge mighty foes.}}
'''Highwind Trial''' is a part of the [[Of Ballads and Brews]] [[Event]] in [[Version 3.1]].

==Event Details==
===Duration===
* 2022/09/29 10:00 - 2022/10/17 03:59

===Summary===
* In the Highwind Trial phase, Travelers need to use the power of Sublime Anemograna to challenge mighty foes.
* Complete [[Exemplary Adventurer!]] to unlock this part of event.

===Tutorial===
{{Tutorial
|image1 = Tutorial Highwind Trial 1.png
|text1  = During the Highwind Trial, you may use the buffs provided by Sublime Anemograna to challenge powerful opponents. You can obtain 3 Sublime Anemograna at any one time, and the buffs you get from them will differ based on the number of Sublime Anemograna you have obtained.<br />These Anemograna will also provide different combat buffs in the three areas covered by the challenge. A buff that takes effect in one area will not take effect in the other areas.
|image2 = Tutorial Highwind Trial 2.png
|text2  = Each challenge area has 5 enemy camps. These camps will have wind currents that will allow you to reach the next camp quickly. The final camp of each challenge stage will have Nemeses that possess different characteristics. Use your Sublime Anemograna and approach with care!
}}

==Tests==
===Fierce Combat Test===
{{Description|The Sublime Anemograna seem to be able to guide powerful winds, forming them into whirling currents capable of sucking opponents in. Use this unique feature to gather great numbers of opponents such that you can deal them all a decisive blow!}}
Available on 2022-09-29 10{{Colon}}00

Sublime Anemograna Buffs:
:You will obtain the following buffs according to the number of Sublime Anemograna you obtain:
:* 1{{Colon}} When you switch characters, you will generate a cyclone that will pull nearby opponents in for 3s. This effect can trigger once every 5s.
:* 2{{Colon}} Enhances the effect of the cyclone such that it will deal 1 instance of Anemo DMG to nearby :opponents every 0.7s.
:* 3{{Colon}} Enhances the effect of the cyclone by increasing the Anemo DMG it deals. The cyclone now persists for 5s.

Camp I (Springvale) Enemies:
* Wave 1: {{Enemy List|Treasure Hoarders: Scout*2;Treasure Hoarders: Marksman*2;Treasure Hoarders: Handyman}}
* Wave 2: {{Enemy List|Treasure Hoarders: Marksman*2;Treasure Hoarders: Handyman;Treasure Hoarders: Crusher}}

Camp II (Windrise) Enemies:
* Wave 1: {{Enemy List|Blazing Axe Mitachurl;Hilichurl;Pyro Slime;Electro Hilichurl Shooter}}
* Wave 2: {{Enemy List|Wooden Shieldwall Mitachurl;Hilichurl Berserker;Pyro Hilichurl Shooter;Electro Hilichurl Shooter}}

Camp III (Starfell Valley) Enemies:
* Wave 1: {{Enemy List|Hydro Abyss Mage;Pyro Abyss Mage;Hilichurl Shooter;Hilichurl}}
* Wave 2: {{Enemy List|Electro Abyss Mage;Geo Samachurl*2}}

Camp IV (Falcon Coast) Enemies:
* Wave 1: {{Enemy List|Cryo Whopperflower;Large Hydro Slime;Large Cryo Slime}}
* Wave 2: {{Enemy List|Pyro Whopperflower;Large Electro Slime;Mutant Electro Slime}}

Camp V (Dadaupa Gorge) Enemies:
* Attendants will aid powerful opponent(s) by:
** Increasing their Physical and Elemental RES;
** Healing them at intervals
* Wave: {{Enemy List|Stonehide Lawachurl;Hilichurl Shooter*3}}

===Ambush Test===
{{Description|No matter how strong the foe, no one will find an attack from above easy to deal with. Use the enhanced jumping power imparted by the Sublime Anemograna and the vertical spaces of the battlefield to surprise your opponents!}}
Available on 2022-10-01 04{{Colon}}00

Sublime Anemograna Buffs:
:You will obtain the following buffs according to the number of Sublime Anemograna you obtain:
:* 1{{Colon}} Characters' jumping power is greatly increased and Plunging Attacks deal 40% increased DMG.
:* 2{{Colon}} Characters' jumping power is greatly increased and Plunging Attacks deal 80% increased DMG.
:* 3{{Colon}} Characters' jumping power is greatly increased, Stamina Consumption is decreased by 30%, and Plunging Attacks deal 150% increased DMG.

Camp 1 Enemies:
* Wave 1: {{Enemy List|Wooden Shieldwall Mitachurl;Wooden Shield Hilichurl Guard*3;Hilichurl Shooter}}
* Wave 2: {{Enemy List|Wooden Shieldwall Mitachurl;Wooden Shield Hilichurl Guard;Hilichurl Berserker;Hilichurl Shooter}}

Camp 2 Enemies:
* Wave 1: {{Enemy List|Large Electro Slime;Large Pyro Slime;Hydro Samachurl;Electro Hilichurl Shooter}}
* Wave 2: {{Enemy List|Eye of the Storm;Pyro Slime*2}}

Camp 3 Enemies:
* Wave: {{Enemy List|Stonehide Lawachurl;Pyro Hilichurl Shooter;Electro Hilichurl Shooter;Hilichurl Berserker}}

Camp 4 Enemies:
* Wave 1: {{Enemy List|Fatui Skirmisher - Electrohammer Vanguard;Fatui Skirmisher - Anemoboxer Vanguard;Fatui Skirmisher - Cryogunner Legionnaire}}
* Wave 2: {{Enemy List|Fatui Pyro Agent*2}}

Camp 5 Enemies:
* Opponents will enter a weakened state after being hit by 3 Plunging Attacks
* Wave: {{Enemy List|Ruin Grader;Ruin Destroyer;Ruin Defender}}

===Endurance Test===
{{Description|Amidst grueling trials, you must ration your strength and attack with a steady rhythm. Some of the Sublime Anemograna can grant great aid in this aspect, allowing adventurers to engage in extended combat...}}
Available on 2022-10-04 04{{Colon}}00
:You will obtain the following buffs after entering battle according to the number of Sublime Anemograna you obtain:
:* 1{{Colon}} Active character will restore 6 Energy every 2s.
:* 2{{Colon}} Active character will restore 12 Energy every 2s.
:* 3{{Colon}} Active character will restore 12 Energy every 2s. Characters will deal 80% increased Elemental Burst DMG.

Camp 1 Enemies:
* Wave 1: {{Enemy List|Pyro Abyss Mage;Blazing Axe Mitachurl; Hilichurl Fighter*2}}
* Wave 2: {{Enemy List|Blazing Axe Mitachurl*2;Electro Samachurl}}

Camp 2 Enemies:
* Wave 1: {{Enemy List|Cryo Abyss Mage;Blazing Axe Mitachurl;Hydro Samachurl;Hilichurl Shooter}}
* Wave 2: {{Enemy List|Pyro Abyss Mage;Blazing Axe Mitachurl}}

Camp 3 Enemies:
* Wave 1: {{Enemy List|Cryo Abyss Mage;Blazing Axe Mitachurl;Hilichurl Berserker;Hilichurl*2}}
* Wave 2: {{Enemy List|Thunderhelm Lawachurl;Electro Abyss Mage}}

Camp 4 Enemies:
* Wave 1: {{Enemy List|Ruin Guard;Blazing Axe Mitachurl*2}}
* Wave 2: {{Enemy List|Frostarm Lawachurl;Electro Samachurl}}

Camp 5 Enemies:
* The powerful opponent(s) will summon Attendants at intervals
* Wave: {{Enemy List|Ruin Grader}}
